text: Oleg Ivanovich Kovalyov (; 7 September 1948 â€“ 11 May 2020) was a Russian politician. He was Governor of Ryazan Oblast from 2008 to 2017. He was a member of the State Duma from 1999 to 2008. He was born in Tbilissky District, Russia. Kovalyov died on 11 May 2020, aged 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the State Duma Category:Ryazan Oblast
title: Oleg Ivanovich Kovalyov
